mapper.select: SELECT lec.*, aca.academyName lectureAcademy FROM lecture lec INNER JOIN academy aca ON lec.academyNo = aca.academyNo WHERE (lec.lectureName LIKE #{keyword} OR aca.academyName LIKE #{keyword}) ORDER BY lectureNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberId, passwd, name, dateOfBirth, gender, tel, zipcode, address, addressDetail, email, regDate) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{email}, SYSDATE())
